Name: HD Items Icons
Author: Othello RHIN
Description:
This mod replaces a very large number of icons of objects in the game by that present on The LodeStone.
- 20k+ icons replaced in the game.
- Icons HQ included (if existing).
- Support of version 5.x of the game
- Resolution from 40 x 40 to 96 x 96.
- Clean alpha mask.
